CustomField.formula: IF( Is_this_from_a_distributor__c = TRUE, IF( AND (NOT( ISBLANK( Email_for_distributor__c )) ,NOT( ISBLANK(App_User_Email_Address__c)), NOT( ISBLANK(Email_for_Regional_New_Account__c))), true, NULL) , IF( AND(NOT( ISBLANK( App_User_Email_Address__c )), NOT( ISBLANK( Email_for_Regional_New_Account__c ))), true, NULL))
CustomField.label: Ready To Send Email?
